ks.client.gamefactory

Interface IUpdateStatus

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameWindow

    public interface IUpdateStatus
    When a game is in play, either: (a) the game is won, in which case incrementNumWins (b) player requests to reset hands (c) player chooses to advance to new hand. That's it. During routine play, the score is updated via the updateScore method.
    Author:
    George Heineman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void incrementNumNewHands()
      Increment number of new hands.
      void incrementNumWins()
      Increment the number of wins.
      void updateScore(int score)
      Update score (can go up or down).
